channel.title: Server Client closes without me closing it
channel.description:
Voule Auto restart Could not find process: java Restarting server Online. Connection from ********-PC.gateway.2wire.net:****** [client-1-Bryan]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 3 ms] [client-1-Bryan]: Invalid Server: wagapalooza.no-ip.biz Clicked button: 29163 Clicked button: 29163 Game saved for player Bryan
The client window just closes on me everytime i try to do something like walk or kill a monster.This happens like every minute or seconds.Can someone please help me.

item.title: Server Client closes without me closing it
item.dc:creator: @r3nz024 r3nz024
item.description:
@r3nz024 wrote:

Fixed it I used windows 7 converter thank u!

Read full topic
item.source: Server Client closes without me closing it

item.title: Server Client closes without me closing it
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

[quote=“r3nz024, post:1, topic:363344”]Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.
Connection from **-PC.gateway.2wire.net:
[client-1-Bryan]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 3 ms]
[client-1-Bryan]: Invalid Server: wagapalooza.no-ip.biz
Clicked button: 29163
Clicked button: 29163
Game saved for player Bryan

The client window just closes on me everytime i try to do something like walk or kill a monster.This happens like every minute or seconds.Can someone please help me.[/quote]

read the google program your using…

[quote=“r3nz024, post:1, topic:363344”]Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java[/quote]

use the runserver program you have instead of voule AUTO restart and if you are running the runserver program then open it up in edit because it will have a path to voule auto restart.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Client closes without me closing it
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

“not being helpfull here :eek:” lol i had a problem like that… everytime someone tryed to talk "and hit enter’ client just randomly closes out and dies XD so i have no idea m8. GL to you on it tho.
on word of advice tho. if u haven’t worked to hard on ‘the client’ clients are VERY easy to change. o_o; just get a new client if its to much trouble.

Read full topic
